Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 314th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/17/2015, off John Whitlow (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/2015, off James Buono (STL)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $707,143 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $707,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/14/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $707,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2018, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 8/27/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
9/21/2018: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $2,140,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Colorado to Houston on 5/31/2020 (Going to COL: C Nathan Noguez. Going to HOU: SS John Goldstein, 2B Jesus Sachs)...
8/14/2020: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/1/2023 to a minor league deal...
